nodes.text: The Old Market Sector was an area of the planet Coruscant. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, a series of riots took place there, which led to the members of the Mon Calamari species being "relocated." A droid mechanic who lived next door to the human child Anandra Milon, recalled that she had been given her first speeder following the riots in the Old Market Sector.
The Old Market Sector was first mentioned in "One Thousand Levels Down", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 in 2014.
